key: Item-Case 3-4-Transmutation Magic on the Guard Rails-displayName
Item-Case 3-4-Transmutation Magic on the Guard Rails-description
original: There are magical traces of transmutation on the guard rail that Justin supposedly broke before falling. These traces are only on the rails that Justin broke. They aren't anywhere else on the walkway…
translation: 贾斯汀坠落前弄坏的护栏上有<u>形变术</u>的魔法痕迹。这些魔法痕迹<u>只</u>出现在贾斯汀弄坏的地方。走道上则是完全没有……
